The Museum of Fine Arts (MFA) in Boston announced today that Zadie Smith will become its next director. Smith will take the helm from Carol Chow, who has served as the MFA’s board president and executive director since 2016, in November 2020. The National Gallery of Canada in Ottawa has received $75 million from the National Arts Fund, Canada’s official source for arts and cultural heritage, in support of the expansion of the institution’s collection and development program.
